name: title
text: Every framework upgrade is a gamble. Will your code break? Let's find out.

name: show_v1
text: Here's a working app built on rivet dee eye version one. It uses adapter dot register, profile enum dot prod, and the old import paths.

name: upgrade_fails
text: You upgrade to dioxide version two. The imports break immediately. Rivet dee eye no longer exists.

name: show_migration
text: But here's the migration guide. Four find-and-replace patterns. Package name, profile enum, decorator API, and container init. That's it.

name: show_v2
text: After the migration, the code looks almost identical. Adapter dot for underscore replaces adapter dot register. Profile dot production replaces profile enum dot prod.

name: tests_pass
text: We run the tests. They pass. Same logic, same behavior, cleaner API.

name: closing
text: We break APIs when we have to. But we never break your trust. Every breaking change comes with a migration path.
